frames.caption: A modern, multi-story beachfront house with expansive glass windows overlooks the ocean. The structure features several balconies and a pool, with luxurious outdoor seating areas. The setting sun casts a warm glow over the scene, enhancing the tranquil atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene depicts a luxurious beachfront house situated directly on the sand, with a stunning view of the ocean. The architecture is modern, characterized by clean lines and extensive use of glass, allowing for panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.

frames.caption: A modern beachfront villa stands majestically against the backdrop of the ocean, with its sleek architectural design and expansive glass windows. The scene captures the villa's multiple levels, each adorned with luxurious outdoor seating areas overlooking the serene waves. Palm trees frame the setting, enhancing the tropical and tranquil atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene depicts a luxurious beachfront villa situated directly on a sandy beach, with the ocean waves gently rolling in the background. The villa's modern design features large glass windows and multiple terraces, offering panoramic views of the sea. The surrounding palm trees and greenery add to the tropical ambiance.

summary: Nature: beach, ocean, palm trees. Objects: outdoor seating, house, pool, balconies, windows. Scenes: beachfront, sunset, luxury, tropical. Concepts: luxury, modern architecture. Emotions: tranquility, serenity
